meanings.definition: Not invited; not requested to attend
meanings.sent1: The uninvited guest showed up at the party.
meanings.sent2: She felt uninvited when she saw everyone else with invitations.
meanings.sent3: The uninvited squirrel decided to crash the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The uninvited rain poured down on the outdoor wedding.
meanings.sent5: The uninvited visitor left a lasting impression on the host.

meanings.definition: Not welcome; not wanted or desired
meanings.sent1: The uninvited noise disrupted the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: His uninvited comments made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The uninvited cat snuck into the house through the window.
meanings.sent4: The uninvited thoughts kept creeping into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The uninvited smell lingered in the room long after they left.
